content: X-BC-C P8 Rebar basket clip with nail Basket clip with preassembled nail for fastening rebar baskets to road beds ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Preassembled rebar clip with nail for faster and more convenient installation Two lengths of preassembled nails available Securely holds rebar in place Applications Fastening rebar baskets to road beds ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material: Carbon steel Color: Grey Application: Formwork Technical Data | Material | Carbon steel | Color | Grey | Application | Formwork | Base materials | Concrete (soft) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 80 mm | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 408257 - Basket clip X-BC-C47 P8 - Package Size 1000 pc - 408255 - Basket clip X-BC-C62 P8 - Package Size 1000 pc - 3497130 - Kit X-BC 62 P8 + 6.8/11 M R bulk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal red - 3812131 - KIT X-BC 62 P8+6.8/11 M10T BULK TITANIUM - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10-X10 T titanium Bulk - 3505347 - Kit X-BC 62 + 6.8/11 M B - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x DX cartridge 6.8/11 M10 STD black - 3812132 - KIT X-BC 62 + 6.8/11 M10BK BLACK - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10 BK black - 3505345 - Kit X-BC 62 + 6.8/11 M Y - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal yellow - 3497129 - Kit X-BC 62 P8 + 6.8/11 M R bulk 10k - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 10000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal red - 3812133 - KIT X-BC 62 P8+6.8/11 M10T BULK (10K) TI - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 10000x DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10-X10 T titanium Bulk - 3505346 - Kit X-BC 62 + 6.8/11 M Y 10k - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 10000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M10 .27 cal C-T yellow
